title: The Essence - Dancing in the Rain: The Best of the Essence
description:
Beautiful collection of songs even if the Cure is present inside... 
Melodies are delightful and songs are gloomy... 
the voice of Hans Diener is often touching... 

To an untrained pair of ears, The Essence sound so much like The Cure that even die-hard Robert Smith disciples can be easily duped.


Essence:

Formed 1984, Netherlands 
Disbanded 1995 

Members: Hans Diener (vocals, guitar, piano, synthesizer), Jeroen "Jerry" Geertsma (bass, 1984-87), Olaf Willemsen (drums, 1984-92), Akki (bass, 1987-92), Mark Tan (keyboards, 1991-95), George Tan (drums, 1992-95), Jos van den Bogert (bass, 1992-95)
